name: ザ・リヴァー・マスト・フロウ
content: You're the one that I adore
And no man could love you more
Let your water cool my pain please
Just like a river that flows to the sea
All my natural dreams will come true
But the rain must fall down tonight
It's a river that flows to the sea
Oh yea the river must flow from me
All my natural dreams will come true
Like a river that flows to the sea
But the rain must fall down tonight
And like a river that flows to the sea
Oh yea the river must flow from me
